title: Parasailing
short_description: Enjoy a bird's eye view of the sea while being towed by a speedboat.
long_description:
Parasailing offers the thrill of flying with the safety of being tethered to a boat. As the speedboat accelerates, the parachute (parasail) fills with air and lifts you 200–300 feet into the sky. It is one of the most popular beach activities in India because it requires zero skill—you just sit in a harness and enjoy the view.

From up high, the noise of the boat fades away, leaving you with a silent, stunning panorama of the coastline, the endless ocean, and the tiny people on the beach below. Winch-boat parasailing (where you take off and land directly on the boat deck) is the safer and more modern standard used in places like Goa and Andaman, ensuring you don't even get wet unless you ask for a 'dip'.

locations.summary: The hub of watersports in Goa. Affordable and readily available.
Premium experience with clearer water and better safety standards.
Parasailing with views of the famous Om-shaped beach coastline.
Popular weekend getaway spot for Mumbai residents.
Scenic flight near St. Mary's Island.

opening_hours.time_notes: Operations stop if wind speed is too high.

operating_season.off_season: Monsoon (June–September) - Closed due to rough sea.
operating_season.season_notes: Best done in the morning when sea is calm.

pricing_metadata.disclaimer: Goa prices are highly negotiable on the beach.

safety_guidelines: Ensure the operator uses a 'Winch Boat' system (landing on boat) rather than landing on the beach.
Check harness straps for wear and tear.
Do not fly if you see dark storm clouds approaching.
Life jacket must be fully buckled.
Follow crew instructions for takeoff (usually sitting down).
major_experiences: Gentle lift-off from the boat deck
Seeing the curvature of the coastline from 300ft
Silence and wind at the top
The 'Dip' (optional) - skimming your feet in the water
Safe winding back onto the boat

sample_itinerary.one_day: Walk to Calangute beach water sports point. Negotitate rate. Board speed boat with 4-5 other flyers. Wait for turn. Flight duration 3-5 mins. Return to shore.

booking_details.suggested_stay: Any beach resort in North Goa.
booking_details.how_to_reach: Activity happens directly on major tourist beaches.
